'''"From This Day, I Pass the Candle's Shadow-Veil"''' is [[Clorinde]]'s [[Level 1 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|a coordinated attack|1}}
** This particle generation has a cooldown of '''2''' seconds, which is shared with the particle generation from Clorinde's [[Hunter's Vigil|Elemental Skill]] and [["And So Shall I Never Despair"|6th Constellation]].
